          <title>
            <string language="sl">Ravna zrcala</string>
            <string language="en">Flat Mirrors</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Flache Spiegel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Miroirs Plats</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Espelhos Lisos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Specchi Piani</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επίπεδοι καθρέφτες</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Espejos Planos</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Prava in navidezna pot žarkov pri dveh ravnih zrcalih.</string>
            <string language="en">The real and virtual ray paths in case of two flat mirrors.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">ravno zrcalo</string>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">zrcalo</string>
            <string language="en">mirror</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die realen und virtuellen Strahlengänge falls von
zwei flachen Spiegeln.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les vraies et virtuelles voies d'accès de rayon 
en cas de deux miroirs plats.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os trajetos de raio reais e virtuais caso que de 
dois espelhos lisos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">I percorsi di raggio reali e virtuali nel caso di 
due specchi piani.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τα πραγματικά και εικονικά μονοπάτια ακτίνων σε 
περίπτωση δύο επίπεδων καθρεφτών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los caminos de rayo verdaderos y virtuales en 
caso de que de dos espejos planos.</string>
          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
